definition: A person who carries out a deliberate act of violence against another individual, often with the intention of causing harm or death. This term is commonly used to describe individuals involved in high-profile incidents or acts of terrorism.

examples.german: Die Polizei konnte den Attentäter identifizieren.
examples.english: The police were able to identify the assassin.

examples.german: Der Attentäter plante einen Anschlag auf das Regierungsgebäude.
examples.english: The assassin planned an attack on the government building.

examples.german: Der Attentäter wurde zu lebenslanger Haft verurteilt.
examples.english: The assassin was sentenced to life imprisonment.

examples.german: Die Sicherheitskräfte konnten den Attentäter rechtzeitig stoppen.
examples.english: The security forces were able to stop the assassin in time.
